website_summaries.verdict: The Jays A-Jays Four earphones provide a well-balanced sound and a polished, utilitarian design that make them excellent replacement earphones for your iOS device.
pros: The Jays A-Jays Four earphones have an executive, durable design, and come with a tangle-free flat cord and unobtrusive three-button iPhone remote
cons: The wide earbud housing can be uncomfortable for some, and the sound lacks punchy bass oomph and dynamic range

customer_reviews.title: Crappy Quality. Evil Company.
customer_reviews.text: I love the design, sound, etc of these headphones. I've bought 3 pairs. They all fail 6 months later in the exact same way. Sound goes out in the right earbud. Very consistently. But my bad review is due to the company. I've inquired about a warranty several times. Their customer support and policies are designed to be obtuse and unhelpful and to filter out loyal customers who just to get a replacement or refund. I've gone several rounds with them and they are useless jerks. Save yourself the trouble and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey R Domke

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. Bought them originally at my local T-Mobile store, but they stopped them, not b/c of the quality, but because people were not buying as they were not familiar with the name. These hands down, are the best headphones I have ever used with my iPhone. So many just junk out after a few months, but these have stayed perfect. My daughter uses these, and won't even touch the Beats earbuds I bought her. If you haven't tried them, I recommend these highly. We own 3 pairs now, and all are in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Evans

customer_reviews.title: A little uncomfortable and unnoticeable improvement in sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Although they do not tangle and the remote feels sturdy and well-made, the headphones themselves are kind of uncomfortable regardless of what size earbuds I use. I have used earbuds in the past with no problem. Also, sound quality is equivalent to a pair of Sony earbuds I used previously. Update 11/6/14 One of the earpieces started only working intermediately. It fades in and out constantly. Must be a bad connection at the audio jack because when I move it around the sound sometimes does come through. Disappointed at quality for the price. Lasted less than 2 years!
customer_reviews.author: Midnite2four

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great inner earbud options to choose from. Easy to untangle....if wrapped up wildly. They could save on more plastic, with the case though, didnt need all of that for presentation, but i guess the manufacturers were going for a premium look. The sound is decent, no complaints on sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: JCazoe

customer_reviews.title: BADLY linked cable
customer_reviews.text: Product was not like new. The cable was BADLY kinked. So much so that I didn't trust its integrity. I returned immediately. The headphones are great though! This was my third set. Girlfriend has one set and the only reason I was replacing mine was that my cat chewed through the cable or my first set would still be going strong
customer_reviews.author: K Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good idea with but with unfortunate consequences
customer_reviews.text: The idea behind the thicker cord of these buds it to prevent tangling of the cords. Sounds wonderful, but it also causes the cord to make a lot of noise when exercising. The thinner cords probably hit each other as much, but you get a dull "thunk" with each step. Very distracting. I also find that the buds don't stay in my ears well-might just be me. Sound is fine for the price. I'll add that while washing my car, one of the buds got a little wet(not immersed in water) and it shorted out that side. These buds will work fine if you are stationary.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Sound great but you hear the sound of the cables
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound great and come with 3 sizes of ear pieces. The construction of the cable and control are first rate. The flat no-tangle cable is great--almost impossible to tangle in a knot, unlike almost every other set of headphones I've used. But the cable is much heavier than conventional earphones and it transmits the noise of friction as the cable brushes against your clothing, jacket, or whatever. I have to use a clip to secure the cable to my lapel, but I still get the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how to quit these flawed headphones
customer_reviews.text: Have bought 5 pairs of these in past 4 years. I love the tangle-free cable, love the sound (mostly for podcasts/audio, so the mild bass doesn't impact me) and the mic is very good for calls/Skype. I just can't quit this damaging relationship, you sleek, attractive, effective but ultimately flawed bastards. For every pair, within 6-9 months (of daily use, and carried scrunched up in pocket), the mic/buttons fail or the 'crackling' starts indicating a bad connection (even after cleaning/swabbing the 3.5mm port on my iPhone). This ultimately results in a malfunctioning mic, buttons and/or either earbud stopping sound. I just wish they were more robust!
customer_reviews.author: tommyk421

customer_reviews.title: Multiple purchases and each one is worse than the last
customer_reviews.text: I am not a happy customer. These are my 3rd pair of these headphones. I have had the most recent pair just over a year but within 6 months they stopped working. I contacted both Amazon and JAYS and they both told me to get lost. The headphones worked OK in the beginning but now not at all. There is a 2 year warranty on these and the company is not honoring their written guarantee. I will change my review if I am allowed to either return these for a refund or am sent a new pair. Until then my review stands... DON'T BUY THESE HEADPHONES!! I wish I had read other reviewers comments better before buying,
customer_reviews.author: ZNB

customer_reviews.title: Finally, Decent, Tangle-Free Ear-buds
customer_reviews.text: These reasonably priced ear buds do the job. They have decent sound, and better yet, they don't get tangled. I was so sick of using earbuds that magically got tangled in the worst possible gordian knots no matter how carefully I stowed them in their little case. Never mind stuffing them in your pocket. These have rubber coated, "ribbon-like" cables which refuse to get tangled up. The control on the right earbud side works fine. I have no complaints about these earbuds at all.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, never tangles, fits extremely well.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing this. The first one didn't break after a year, I accidentally left it in an airplane. I really really like the cord as the tape-like shape makes it harder to tangle and such. I also have a tragus piercing, which makes it difficult for me to find earphones that stays on my ear AND fits comfortably. This is the perfect one for me so far. The quality is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Eliora

customer_reviews.title: Used to be great, now not so much ...
customer_reviews.text: Great when they work. I had an original version for a couple of years. I travel often and rely on my headphones for getting some quiet time. Not a fan of the over ear headphones because you cant sleep. Replaced them with the same and they died quickly. Bought another set thinking I abused them and they died as well. Quality has gone down hill. It's too bad because I really liked these.
customer_reviews.author: John Terech

customer_reviews.title: Remote control not working
customer_reviews.text: I returned the unit to Amazon since the remote did not work - thus the 2 stars rating. While I find Amazon's return service is excellent and very courteous, I think for this product it is best to test it in-store (my son had similar problem with A-Jays One+). I bought from a local store and it has been working well (balanced sound, and excellent for voice communication as well). I would have given it 4-star if it works well in the first instance.
customer_reviews.author: fsma

customer_reviews.title: Start out great but within several months the right ear will lose ...
customer_reviews.text: Start out great but within several months the right ear will lose sound - can only hear out of one ear. Have had several pairs and will not buy again. No durability.
customer_reviews.author: Winthrop Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: The sound is good and for me has a great balance of bass ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of the same headphones. The sound is good and for me has a great balance of bass and treble. Earphones are very easy on the ears and don't slide off if you have have the correct size on and the fact that they don't tangle is a huge plus. I use it all day and they are generally crumpled up in my jeans pockets when I travel. I would recommend this product without any hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: NYCSGPNYC

customer_reviews.title: Awful for listening to music
customer_reviews.text: I bought these, but never ended up using them because the sound quality was so inferior to the stock earbuds that I received with my iPhone. Really tinny sounding, with no bass at all, but also distorted at higher volumes. Shockingly bad. I gave them away. I purchased for the tangle free design, but never got to the stage of testing them for that--too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Reed

customer_reviews.title: The sound is good. I had for short time because I lost ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good. I had for short time because I lost them. However, I recomned this earphones. They don’t tangle. Good material
customer_reviews.author: jaime

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I use these all the time. the cable seldom gets tangled, and when it does, a couple of shakes and it is free. The buds are small enough that you can use them in bed. They sit in my ear so I can lay on my side and not have them cause discomfort. If these ever fail, I will be ordering them again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R. Page

customer_reviews.title: No What I had Hoped
customer_reviews.text: Never really got into these. The overall design is well executed and user friendly. I never had any complaints about microphone quality when using calls. However, I did feel like they were $30 earbuds. They never fit in my ears quite as well as I would have hoped. My old Shures and current RHA are much better. Sound quality is ok. It could be much better with better ear plastic. My main complaint is that they stopped working a year after the cord's 1 year warranty expired. I would have asked for another pair, but I just wasn't impressed enough to put any effort into it.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Decent Sound, but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Over all Quality in sounds is excellent. Then again it should be considering the price. the earbuds themselves did not fit well in my ear and tended to fall out. Partially from the fact that the earbud housing didn't exactly fit well in my ear. Noise/sound cancelling was more like a muffing and wasn't as good as some of the cheaper earbuds Ive owned.
customer_reviews.author: Kyungho

customer_reviews.title: Amazing earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I have personally had two pairs of a-jays the first pair (a-jays two) broke after two and a half years of hard use. By hard use i means I was roofing one house and a gymnasium and they snagged on stuff daily. These earbuds have amazing sound quality easily comparable to beats earbuds. Built like a tank and high quality what else can I say?
customer_reviews.author: Janet Martin

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: I've been through a lot of headphones and these were unremarkable. They showed visible signs of wear after a very short amount of time and one of the earbuds stopped working in the first month or so. Had high hopes, but I definitely wouldn't recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Basil Kolani

customer_reviews.title: A- Jays Four do what is says on the tin...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great but they tend to fail after about a year to 18 months. The warranty is good though and I am on my third pair - 2 of which are warranty replacements. Sound quality is excellent and the tangle free cord is great. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Winward

customer_reviews.title: the best thing about them
customer_reviews.text: the best thing about them, is that you can have them in your pocket all day, and when you want to use them, you can just take them out, and they are ready for use (the fat cord dont get tangled..) Sound is o.k, and they are quite comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent Replacement Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a replacement set when my iPhone buds broke. They are pretty solid...but the chord is a a little clunky. Sound quality is everything it needs to be, and they are comfortable if you take the time to fit them to your ears. I would recommend for everyday use, but maybe not for running/exercise. $20 is a steal $40 is a fair price...wouldn't pay more than $50 for them.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Consmer

customer_reviews.title: Cool design and very open sound
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design from this company in Stockholm. Their sound tends to be more open, meaning not as much deep bass, which is more of a Beats style sound. These lend themselves well to music more in the jazz, country vein and not the hip-hop or funk
customer_reviews.author: Flash Gordon S

customer_reviews.title: nearly perfect.
customer_reviews.text: So these are GREAT sounding earbuds. They have great bass response for being such small speakers, but not overly massive that the other transients are pushed out of the way. The controls on the cord are very helpful, especially during biking when you can't exactly pull your phone out to skip or rewind. The only reason I wouldn't give them 5 stars is the design of the cord. The no-tangle spaghetti flat design (whose intended purpose works great) is by no means discrete. I'm still using them, I'm not returning them for this, but if the cable was just a little more out of the way these would my perfect choice.
customer_reviews.author: drobi1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste money on high end buds like Beats. These sound great for less than 1/7th the price
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones for Conference Calls and Music
customer_reviews.text: I have had three pairs of these over the last five years. For the money there is no better headphones out there. I am on the phone for hours at a time and these are perfect - music sounds great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A Marotta

customer_reviews.title: They have great sound quality while they last
customer_reviews.text: I received them as planned, this is my fifth pair to purchase. They have great sound quality while they last. However, I am concerned about their durability. Most often one side loses all sound functions. If I experience this again, I will claim poor quality and rate them a zero.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan P Rossman

customer_reviews.title: ... workouts when I travel and they have held up great so far
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for a long time now for workouts when I travel and they have held up great so far. The flat cable allows for it to be tangle free in the gym bag and it is sweat proof.
customer_reviews.author: Optimus Prime

customer_reviews.title: Be gentle with them
customer_reviews.text: I loved these, but the internal wiring became damaged really easily and quickly. I was very sad because while these worked, they were possibly the best earbuds I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Ear to ear
customer_reviews.text: After many trials with other top rated earbud company's. I have finally found a flat cord almost tangle free earbud co. that has done a good job in music quality & phone conversion quality. They are reasonably priced, fit well, easy to change tracks, answer phone & adjust volume, very similar to apple earbud products. The construction of the JAYS T00075 appears to be of good quality. Will know of its longevity in a year from now. The only thing I would change is the right angle of the plug to a straight inline stereo plug.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: didnt last very long
customer_reviews.text: as a person who likes there music these headphones ( i thought ) would suit me fine after a few months the right ear crackles of distortion this is my second pair it seems neither the seller or even jays stand behind this product dont buy
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Dandridge

customer_reviews.title: Better than the two B's
customer_reviews.text: For the money, these are far more superior headphones that either of the two popular ones that start with a B. I've had friends who had the other, more expensive, and they like these better.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Love these things
customer_reviews.text: Love these things! lightweight and the flat cord is great for wearing through your clothes when working out. Downside is that the flat 90 degree angle at the plug always seems to break internally, making this my 4th pair.
customer_reviews.author: tbuff1

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: great sound quality. Doesn't fit my ear canal to be secure in the ear. Always falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon G

customer_reviews.title: Be aware that the rubber cord is non-slip. This ...
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that the rubber cord is non-slip. This probably will work well for anyone using it for working out or other uses that benefit from non-slip cords. It didn't work for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great sound and comfortable in the ear
customer_reviews.text: Only problem is that the thicker cord gives a stethoscope effect when dangling and hitting my body.i fixed this problem by using small alligator clip to attack the cord to my shirt. Overall, great sound and comfortable in the ear.
customer_reviews.author: David J Grimes

customer_reviews.title: good headphones, good place to buy
customer_reviews.text: Bough this product a while back and so far no problems. With no problems, I'm happy with this purchase because I saved money compared to buying it anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Konicek

customer_reviews.title: love you
customer_reviews.text: love you still haven't tested each bud to see which works best for me but so far so good, the mic controller works much better than my previous earbuds the sound quality is great, but I know if I switch around the buds and find the right size, it'll be even better. ps: fast delivery, that's why I love you
customer_reviews.author: J. Manzano

customer_reviews.title: The best commuter in-ear buds I have found so far.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality and noise isolation qualities; excellent no-tangle wire profile, and functional interface. Durability is not great, but equals or exceeds that of other manufacturers (e.g., Sennheiser).
customer_reviews.author: DjinNTonic

customer_reviews.title: All good.
customer_reviews.text: All is well. This product fits the description. The quality is excellent. Recommend for purchase. Happy new year ! !
customer_reviews.author: Boris Lozovskiy

customer_reviews.title: Above Average
customer_reviews.text: Overall these headphones have performed above average so far. The controls are dead on with my iTouch as they should be since it is designed for iOS devices. The results with a an Android phone and tablet are hit and miss. Granted Jays does have an app for the one button version and it is supposed to work with these 3 button control but I had mixed results. I don't know if they have plans to update the app but I also am not worried about it since I just need it to answer when someone calls.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE that these earbuds DO NOT get tangled up, like the iPhone earbuds. I highly recommend these to everyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Emoyea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I've ever had. I've had several pairs now.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Dahlquist

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones For A Great Price!!
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought these headphones I had a Pair of Beats Earbuds, They were pretty good but they were pretty expensive.. But, The sound quality of these earbuds are Just as Good & Alot Cheaper.. Although when you first get them you might get feedback when you move the cord while its plugged in, But after a while with using it, It goes away.. Overall I believe it's a great deal if you're looking for decent priced earbuds with great sound..
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: Only had a few months and there's a short in them alread...bummer
customer_reviews.author: beloved 41

customer_reviews.title: Great ear buds
customer_reviews.text: I love these buds. The sound is great and they don't hurt your ears. More importantly they don't knot all the time. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Burt Y

customer_reviews.title: Better choices for the active mover.
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good but when walking you can hear the chord banging around. Better choices for the active mover...
customer_reviews.author: Masashi O.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working suddenly
customer_reviews.text: My earphones worked perfectly for a bit more than 2 years. And then suddenly, from one day to the other, stopped working. Funny enough the warranty is for only 2 years, and the costumer service is awful and says to talk with resellers.
customer_reviews.author: Drumond

customer_reviews.title: Tangle-free cord
customer_reviews.text: This cord typically doesn't get tangled when I put it in my pocket, unlike the standard issue iPhone earbuds. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: k9squad

customer_reviews.title: Great audio quality with these
customer_reviews.text: Great audio quality with these. No complaints at all after all these years of wearing them running and being active.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat these earphones. Especially for the $30 I paid for them.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua E.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I use them all the time, particularly for work outs. beats anything else I've used in the market accept for my Boss.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Buckman

customer_reviews.title: Stop working after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: They are nice when they work after about 6 months one earbud no longer works. Second pair to do this. Not buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Baker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product I have been using for years - delivered very efficiently
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Really good headphones for the price. Would buy again for sure. The best part, aside from the sound quality, is that I never have to untangle the cord.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD BLUESTEIN

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much for the fast shipping and safe shipping. I really needed these as my back up headphones. The wires seem like they will last for ever with out shorting out. They never fall out of my ears. I especially love the remote built on to it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: deezy8711

customer_reviews.title: Get them to fit and you'll love them.
customer_reviews.text: Spent some time figuring out which earbuds fit my ears (and realized I need different sizes for each ear), and then loved them! Really high quality construction, great sound and no more tangling. A great value. Thank's Jays!
customer_reviews.author: Francisco F. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headphones for the price. Would recommend. I was skeptical that the flat wiring would help prevent tangling, but I've yet to have these tangle on me.
customer_reviews.author: Justin C. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound and look
customer_reviews.text: Love these earbuds. Bought them a few weeks ago and love them. They are easy to use and with the inline remote control cover all the needs of an iPhone user. Sounds is great once they are fitted to the sounds is great!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Goepel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were great but only lasted a year before the microphone and music controls stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Larry Droguett

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Been using Audio Technica earpiece for a long time, I thought they were the best till it broke. Heard reviews that the A-Jays four were good. And I'm impressed at the very instance. Sound is very balanced. Bass quite good too. Recommended if you want a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jazli

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I did a long research into earbuds and found the Jays product rated quite well overall. The a-jays four is definitely value for money and the tangle free cord makes life with these earbuds easy. I would recommend this product for everyone who looking for a stylish and great earbud.
customer_reviews.author: Csaba Cseresnyes

customer_reviews.title: Terrible microphone quality
customer_reviews.text: These look great and feel sturdy. But the microphone is awful. I haven't been able to have a conversation that didn't sound spotty on the other end since buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Regis

customer_reviews.title: Best earbuds ever
customer_reviews.text: Best earbuds ever! I have trouble finding earphones that fits good and does not hurt. Those are just perfect, the sound is also pretty clear.
customer_reviews.author: Gleice Rudelli

customer_reviews.title: Great Earphone
customer_reviews.text: good sound quality and sturdy too... A little expensive but re really different from anyone thing else I have usd
customer_reviews.author: Mn

customer_reviews.title: Right ear bud always break
customer_reviews.text: Second time the right ear bud broke on me. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Buck

customer_reviews.title: No more tangles
customer_reviews.text: no more tangled cords Spend your time listening to great music with out dealing with spaghetti wired ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: OH3Cobra

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones
customer_reviews.text: My son was really happy with them!!! He had a pair of Jays and lost them, and they are his favorite headphones he has ever owned
customer_reviews.author: Lori Cobabe

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about these 'xcept the shape does not ensure ...
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these 'xcept the shape does not ensure a good fit in my ear. They fall out too easily. UPDATE: These lasted almost exactly a year. I have no complaints. Probably due to broken wires, the right ear became very difficult to hear from and I had to replace them. They never did stay in my ear very well, but over all they are a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Total crap. Dies in a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these headphones I have bought. while the sound quality is good, the build quality is total crap. They stop working (in one ear or the other) within a month. DO NOT BUY. AVOID. go buy something that lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Eboy

customer_reviews.title: Good concept, cheap execution
customer_reviews.text: I love the tangle-free cord, the buttons are easy to find by touch. The sound is just ok but for the price I was not expecting anything more, but the volume controls stopped responding after less than a month. Shure SE215 here I come.
customer_reviews.author: C. Albanese

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I really loved these earphones. The design is beautiful and the sound is great. It arrived on time and in perfect conditions. I recomend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Fabricio

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, but lots of cord noise. I also have odd volume fluctuations in one ear.
customer_reviews.author: George Marshall

customer_reviews.title: always work great, looking for five more great years of music
customer_reviews.text: Second set, first lasted 5 years, stuffs in pocket every day, always work great, looking for five more great years of music!
customer_reviews.author: Rick O.

customer_reviews.title: you need these
customer_reviews.text: These thinks are great. the sound is perfect and the other person think you are talking directly into the phone. I wish I had these sooner
customer_reviews.author: ryan geller

customer_reviews.title: Overhyped
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this after reading many positive reviews on the web. I had high expectations but was very disappointed. The sound wasn't anything spectacular. The design is easy on the eyes but what good is that if it sounds like crap. I gladly returned it and probably never buy a JAYS product again since there are so much better out there for less money.
customer_reviews.author: ykimchi

customer_reviews.title: Great ear buds for price
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great, deep bass and crisp mids and highs. Only complaint in the comfort after 2 hrs of use
customer_reviews.author: Killacam540

customer_reviews.title: save your time and money
customer_reviews.text: purchased these earbuds for the look and finish. Quick shipping, packaged as expected. Loaded into my ipod touch and the sound quality off the bat was not worth $5. Due to the great return policy of the seller/amazon, I placed back in the packaging within 1 hr of purchase. I have since purchased the Sens CX475 earbud and realized that sound quality should never be sacrificed for a microphone. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: north carolina 1

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN!!
customer_reviews.text: After a few months the headphones broke. The headphone jack fell off. I tried contacting the seller to see if the warranty would replace it they never replied back. So I'm not really satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Nice set with a variety of ear plug sizes
customer_reviews.text: Very happy so far.... haven't used it yet but I think it will work just fine!
customer_reviews.author: ValueRays

customer_reviews.title: Great cable design...poor sound
customer_reviews.text: I only kept these headphones for 24 hours. The rubber coated cables make these headphones truly "tangle free". The downside was (in my opinion) the poor sound quality. They lacked any type of base and music sounded flat. Would not buy product if interested in having bass in your ears.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the perfect headset
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. The cord is light and flexible. I use them everyday at work. When I talk on the phone with the people say they can't tell the difference and I sound crystal clear. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DertzMcGertzz

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Well I found the flat untangle earphones of iphone for a while, except this there is still Dr Dre's ones. Anyway, compared with those ones, JAYS Four is nearly half price of them. But the sound quality, I should say something. It is not bad I should say. However in this price, this one is not reach my expectation. Especially in Bass sound area. Well, maybe I love bass and pay much more attention to the bass sound.
customer_reviews.author: southpenguin

customer_reviews.title: No sound after few months
customer_reviews.text: Died again.. Love the fit of these, but i have had so many for the past years and its just not worth it...
customer_reviews.author: Maja Gudmundsen

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, the connection is failing already
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, the connection is failing already. Not sure these are authentic, had Jays earphones before and these are different
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sounds quality is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: You can't listen to music with it. The sounds quality is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Miles Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: So so quality, bad packaging, terrible ear buds
customer_reviews.text: The headphones/earbuds are just so so. I tried them with my ipod, my mac and a linux machine and the sound quality is definitely not worth the price you pay for them. The packaging is utter rubbish and took a good ten minutes to slide out (the indestructible packaging that most phones come in are way way better). As for the ear buds, I am quite sure I almost dislocated my thumb trying to change them. Some people say "you don't need to be a rocket scientist to do this" but believe me.. I AM A ROCKET SCIENTIST and this was just a downright horrible pair of earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: AD84

product_meta.title: a-JAYS Four for iPhone, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackTake charge of your earphones! Stop worrying about tangled cables and ill-fitting ear pieces. The a-JAYS Series is bursting with product innovations such as the newly-developed, tangle-resistant, flat cable and is supplied with up to five pairs of silicone sleeves designed to give you the best possible earphone fit meaning that you can take superior sound and design quality with you wherever you go. There has never been a more affordable way to get yourself immersed in the world of in-ear headphones; the new a-JAYS Series gives you a listening experience that is far superior to that of the standard earbuds packaged with your MP3 player or phone.
feature_bullets: 8.6mm dynamic driver optimized for heavy bass impact and engaging sound response.
Features a 3 button remote with AMART-feel soft touch concave/convex buttons for perfect grip.
5 Silicone sleeves, XXS to L, to achieve a natural, comfortable fit in the ear and maximum external sound insulation.
